Events that occurred on 30 July

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1955 - J.R.R. Tolkien goes to Italy with Priscilla Tolkien.
1988 - Mythcon 19 in Berkeley, California.
1989 - Mythcon 20 at University of British Columbia, Vancouver.
1993 - Mythcon 24 at University of Minnesota, Minneapolis.
1999 - Mythcon 30 in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
2004 - Mythcon 35 at University of Michigan in Ann Arbor.
2004 - The Lord of the Rings Symphony at Heinz Hall in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
2006 - ELF 2006 in Secaucus, New Jersey.
2015 - Tolkien Calendar 2016 is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
T.A. 3019:
The funeral procession of king Th√©oden travels toward Edoras.
